summary.span: 为所有站点地图数据提供程序提供公共基类，并为开发人员提供一条实现自定义站点地图数据提供程序的途径，这些提供程序可与 ASP.NET 站点地图基础结构一起用作 对象的持久存储区。

span.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类表示抽象类的默认实现。 The and classes represent the default implementations of the abstract class. 使用名为 web.sitemap 的 XML 文件来存储站点地图数据。The uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data. 有关 web.sitemap 文件的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 网站地图](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20). 类通过声明和属性来支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。 The class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the and properties. 可以是另一个提供程序的子级或父级。A can be a child or parent of another provider. 这可以实现以下方案: 不同的开发组拥有或实现网站的不同内容区域, 这些组维护自己的网站图和站点地图提供程序。This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers. 所有对象均在 web.config 文件中配置。All objects are configured in the Web.config files. 在这些配置文件中声明的所有站点地图提供程序都将在运行时加载, 并用于加载和处理站点导航数据。Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data. 对象, 该对象跟踪通过其属性集合提供的所有提供程序, 并提供对由提供程序管理的导航数据的编程访问。 The object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers. 下面的代码示例演示了用于声明 Web.config 文件中的站点地图提供程序的格式。The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. ``` ``` 这些提供程序加载的站点导航数据由站点地图基础结构的其他组件 (如和控件) 用于显示用户的站点地图信息。The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the and controls, to display site map information for users. 如果实现自己的站点地图提供程序, 则可以将源文件放置在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 App_Code 目录中, 然后将自动编译该程序集。If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically. 你还可以将自己的站点地图提供程序置于全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中, 并在 web.config 文件中提供对该提供程序的完全限定引用。You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file. 有关编译器服务的详细信息, 请参阅使用[程序集和全局程序集缓存](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写实现抽象类的类。The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract class. 此示例仅包含一个示例和一个与之一起使用的示例文本文件。This example includes only a sample and a sample text file that works with it. 若要运行此示例, 还需要在 web.config 文件和 .aspx 页中输入一个条目。To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page. 可以在属性的文档中找到这些属性。You can find these in the documentation for the property. 该示例使用以逗号分隔的文件, 该文件遵循预期结构来加载站点地图信息。The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information. 该文件的第一行表示站点地图的根节点, 后续行是子节点。The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes. 每个子节点通过 URL 标识其父节点。Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL. 下面显示了符合这些条件的文件示例。An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below. ``` default.aspx,Home,MyCompany Home Page, sale.aspx,Now On Sale,Check Out These Great Deals!,default.aspx catalog.aspx,Online Catalog,Browse Our Many Great Items!,default.aspx ``` `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` 提供所有属性和方法的示例实现。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the properties and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类派生的类必须实现抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. 提供的 URL 可以是虚拟 URL 或绝对 URL。The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL. 它也可能是使用与`~/apprelativedirectory`应用程序相关的语法的 URL, 例如。It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`. 确保方法的任何实现都能正确分析和处理应用程序相关的语法。Ensure that any implementation of the method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly. 类是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序, 它使用对象的 URL 作为类维护的各种集合中的键。 The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此, 如果提供 URL, 则它在站点地图提供程序的作用域内必须是唯一的。Therefore, if a provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未提供 URL, 则会生成一个唯一标识符用于标识。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现实现抽象 类的类中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. 使用名`FindUrl`为的帮助器方法从对象获取当前显示的页的 URL。 `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the object. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法并不实际生成站点地图, 它只准备对象的状态来实现此目的。The method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the object to do so. 默认实现从站点导航配置中初始化网站地图提供程序的属性。The default implementation initializes the property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration. 从派生的类可以重写方法, 以初始化从持久存储区加载站点地图数据所需的任何状态和资源。Classes that derive from the can override the method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage. 例如, 如果您的派生类使用文件来存储站点地图数据, 则可以在方法中执行任何文件初始化。For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the method. 如果派生类使用某种其他类型的数据存储区, 如关系数据库, 则可能会执行初始化数据库连接。If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed. 其他属性 (如文件名或连接字符串) 由 ASP.NET 配置系统读取, 并使用其 参数传递给方法。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with its parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法以准备 Microsoft Access 数据库连接。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection. 在方法的 参数中传递对象的连接字符串。 The connection string for the object is passed in the parameter of the method. 在这种情况下, 连接字符串由 Web.config 文件中特定于提供程序的部分提供。In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file. 在此`accessSiteMapConnectionString` , 包含一个连接字符串, 用于承载站点地图数据的 Microsoft Access 数据库。Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data. ``` ``` 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#2)]

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to first call the method for the base class before performing your own initializations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现类的所有类都可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。All classes that implement the class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 提供程序之间的任何分层关系均由提供程序自身在集合范围之外进行维护。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 有关功能提供程序层次结构的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现实现抽象 类的类中的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用简单逻辑来确定当前提供程序是否为提供程序层次结构的一部分。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy. 如果提供程序是层次结构的一部分, 则它会使用父提供程序的属性作为其自身。If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the property for the parent provider as its own. 如果提供程序不是层次结构的一部分, 则提供程序是其自身的根提供程序。If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 当调用 属性时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过订阅 事件, 可以创建当前请求页的表示形式, 而无需实现自定义站点地图提供程序。You can create a representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the event. 当调用 属性时, 订阅服务器附加一个对象来接收通知, 并且可以返回自定义对象, 而不是由属性返回的默认对象。 Subscribers attach a object to receive notification when the property is called and can return a custom object instead of the default one that is returned by the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
